definition: A Dream of Red Mansions (first completed edition 1791) by Cao Xueqin 曹雪芹[Cao2 Xue3 qin2], one of the four great novels
house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]
dream/CL:場|场[chang2],個|个[ge4]/(bound form) to dream

sentences.english: She played the role of lin daiyu in a shaoxing adaptation of dream of the red chamber.
sentences.chinese: 她在紹興摺子戲中扮演紅樓夢的林黛玉。

sentences.english: This park is laid out in imitation of Grand View Garden in "a Dream of Red Mansions".
sentences.chinese: 這個公園是仿照《紅樓夢》裏的大觀園設計的。

sentences.english: Mansions" is one of China's four famous book !"
sentences.chinese: 大家都知道“紅樓夢”是中國的四大名著之一。

sentences.english: The non-scientificity of "Textual Research on 'Dream of Red Chamber'" is obvious.
sentences.chinese: 《紅樓夢考釋》的非科學性是顯而易見的。

sentences.english: Lin Daiyu is my favorite character from the "Dream of the Red Mansion".
sentences.chinese: 林黛玉是《紅樓夢》中我最喜歡的角色。

sentences.english: Dream of Red Mansions" is a masterwork."
The language of the Dream of Red Mansions is the model of the common language of Chinese in the 18~(th) century.
sentences.chinese: 《紅樓夢》語言是十八世紀漢民族共同語的典範。

sentences.english: Is one of the Dream of the Red Chamber , the.
sentences.chinese: 我可以說她可以稱的上紅樓夢中的王熙鳳了。

sentences.english: The novel expressed a warning in the flourishing age of late feudal society.
sentences.chinese: 《紅樓夢》是封建社會末期的“盛世危言”。

sentences.english: In The Dream of Red Mansion, Cao Xueqin portrayed a female character-Qin Keqing.
sentences.chinese: 在《紅樓夢》中，曹雪芹塑造了秦可卿這位女性。

sentences.english: I can say that she can be called on the Dream of the Red Chamber of Wang Xifeng.
sentences.chinese: 我可以說她可以稱的上紅樓夢中的王熙鳳了。

sentences.english: I have a binding-edition Dream of the Red Chamber. Do you want to read it?
sentences.chinese: 我有一本精裝版《紅樓夢》，你想不想看？

sentences.english: Dream of Red Mansions is a poem-like novel.
A Dream of Red Mansions is a tragedy evanescence of beauty.
sentences.chinese: 所以說《紅樓夢》是一部美的幻滅的悲劇。

sentences.english: Dream of Red Mansions is a great literary work which is profound in thought.
sentences.chinese: 《紅樓夢》是一部體大思精的文學著作。

sentences.english: This application contains the first 20 chapters of HongLouMeng in traditional Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 本程序包含繁體版《紅樓夢》前20回。

definition: Journey to the West, Ming dynasty novel by Wu Cheng'en 吳承恩|吴承恩, one of the Four Classic Novels of Chinese literature/also called Pilgrimage to the West or Monkey
"Redology", academic field devoted to the study of A Dream of Red Mansions
theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe
abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
The Story of the Stone, another name for A Dream of Red Mansions 紅樓夢|红楼梦[Hong2 lou2 Meng4]
to do textual research/to make textual criticism/to verify by means of research (esp. historical details)/to take an exam to get a certificate (abbr. for 考取證件|考取证件[kao3 qu3 zheng4 jian4])
script for play, opera, movie etc/screenplay/scenario
